meanings.definition: The state or quality of being terrible.
meanings.sent1: The terribleness of the storm kept us indoors all day.
meanings.sent2: The terribleness of the situation made everyone anxious.
meanings.sent3: Despite the terribleness of the movie, we couldn't stop laughing at its absurdity.
meanings.sent4: The terribleness of the news hit her like a ton of bricks.
meanings.sent5: The terribleness of the smell in the room was overwhelming.

meanings.definition: The extent to which something is terrible.
meanings.sent1: We couldn't ignore the terribleness of the damage caused by the fire.
meanings.sent2: The terribleness of the food at the restaurant was disappointing.
meanings.sent3: The terribleness of his jokes was so bad that we couldn't help but chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The terribleness of the traffic made her late for the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The terribleness of the pain in his knee was unbearable.
